hero.title: I'm Terry - a Next.js/TypeScript developer who ships fast, keeps promises, and owns outcomes.
hero.description: I combine production discipline (clean, tested, documented code) with product sense (scope ruthlessly, measure what matters) and ownership (I treat your app like mine).

strongFit.title: I'm a strong fit for your team

points.0: I scope to must-haves first, then iterate — momentum > perfection.
points.1: I communicate early and clearly: weekly demos, no surprises.
points.2: I design for change: typed code, modular architecture, tests where it counts.
points.3: I'm comfortable across the stack: Next.js/React, Node, Postgres, vector search, basic cloud.
points.4: I've shipped AI features (RAG, assistants) on small projects and know the pitfalls (latency, evals, adoption).
points.5: I document decisions so future you (or teammates) can move fast without me.

0.title: Clarity > Cleverness
0.description: Readable, typed, predictable code beats magic. Future-proof means future-readable.

1.title: Measure What Matters
1.description: Latency, uptime, adoption. I pick 2-3 metrics and build around them.

2.title: Owner's Mindset
2.description: I optimize for the long-term health of your product, not just 'done'.

0.title: Frontend & Platform
0.description: React/Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, TanStack Query, CI/CD.

1.title: Backend & Data
1.description: Node.js, Postgres/Neon, REST, auth, file storage, background jobs, logging.

2.title: AI
2.description: RAG/assistants, prompt & context, evals basics, latency budgets, product adoption focus.

0.description: I fell in love with the craft of building fast, reliable web apps. Over time I focused on TypeScript/Next.js and pragmatic AI — not hype, just features users adopt.

1.description: Built MVPs and AI proofs on small projects; learned to cut scope, design for change, and keep latency budgets honest. I care about developer ergonomics and long-term maintainability.

2.description: You get someone who moves quickly without breaking tomorrow, communicates clearly, and treats your product like an owner.

items.0: Can deliver an MVP baseline with clean, typed code and CI.
items.1: Comfortable integrating AI features where they truly help users.
items.2: Understands product trade-offs; scopes ruthlessly for momentum.
items.3: Writes docs and ADRs so future work is faster.
items.4: Collaborates well with PM/Design; async by default, quick when needed.

cta.title: Want the no-fluff version?
cta.description: If you value speed, clarity, and ownership — I'm a good match. Happy to walk through code or past work.
